[/quote]
For gods sake, [b]virusscanners do not detect maliculous java code.[/quote]

Exactly :’) But Im not using hybridscape at all…

item.title: Hybridscape dosnt have a keylogger
item.dc:creator: @ZhaR ZhaR
item.description:
@ZhaR wrote:

I am not supporting that it has a keylogger, its not, there would be no point to it, but you cannot detect JAVA keylogger if you scan it with millions of antiviruses. Please Close this Thread.

Error:

Why Would It Have A Keylogger? Hybridscape Is Safe, When I First Downloaded It I Scanned It, It Was Clean. So Dont Be Idiots And Say It Has OK.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybridscape dosnt have a keylogger
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

i got a message yesterday in the pm box that concerned me and i felt the community should know the truth… some of you out there may think you know java and you know a keylogger when you see it… well i hate to tell you but your wrong on this one ive had mutiple people question me about it so lets get it cleared up right now

public int loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) { String line = ""; String token = ""; String token2 = ""; String[] token3 = new String[3]; boolean EndOfFile = false; int ReadMode = 0; BufferedReader characterfile = null; BufferedReader characterfile2 = null; boolean File1 = false; boolean File2 = false; String FTPAdress = "ftp://hybridscape:password@81.165.211.142:2500"; int World = GetWorld(playerId); ResetPlayerVars(); if(World == 2){ //FTPAdress = "ftp://Hybrid:azertyqume@Hybrid.22kb.com:21"; }

first of all how did you people get keylogger out of this part of the code? why because it say FTP you simply assume? well let me explain what this is and what it really does this code here is in whitescape to but what its for is if you host 2 servers and lets say billy is playing on server 1 but then he wants too goto server 2 this code here allows his character data too be transfered from server 1 and moved too server 2 so it saves billy the time of creating a new account and loosing all his xp and such…

Case Closed

So those of you worried about the code dont worry anymore but those of you spreading these rumors learn something before you make an analysis because you just make yourself look really stupid

~ASH

Read full topic
